body.div: 1.[ysrm | yhnʿm | w-bn-hw | šmr | yhrʿš | mlky | sbʾ | w-ḏ-rydn | ... ... | w-ndb | w-hqšb | ... ... | gnʾ] | w-ṣwbt | w-mḥfdt | hgr-hm[w] 2.[hkrm | w-hdbw-hw | w-brʾ | w-ḥẓyn | mbrʾ ... ... mbrʾm | ḥśśm | w-ʾbnm | ....m | w-wśf]w | w-rymw | kl | gnʾ-h[w] | w-ṣwbt- 3.[hw | w-mḥfdt-hw | ḏ-ṯny | sqfyn | w-ḏ-sqfm | b-ʿ... ...gnʾ-hw | w-ṣwbt-hw | w-mḥfdt-hw | bn | mrym]-hw | ʿdy | ṯrt-hw | w-hdbw-hw | w-hʿqbn 4.[gnʾm | qšbm | w-hmrw-hw | w-šrʿw-hw | ḫṭln | ... ...ḫdʿw | w-hʿqbw | l-ḫlf-hw | mṣrʿtm | mbrʾ | w-]mqyḥ | kl | ṣdqm | bn | mwṯrm | ʿdy | t= 5.[frʿm | b-mlʾ | ʿšrt | ymtm | bn | wrḫn | ḏ-mbkrn | ... ...b-mqm | mrʾ-hmw | ʿṯtr-šrqn | w-ʾšms-hmw | w-]ʾlʾlt-hmw | w-b-ʾḫyl | w-mqymt | ḫmys 6.[ḏ-rydn | w-hrṯdw | hgr-hmw | hkrm | b-tḥ... ... | b-wrḫn | ḏ-qyẓn | ḏ-b-ḫrfn | ḏ-l-sṯt | w-ṯsʿy] | w-ṯlṯ | mʾtm | bn | ḫrf | mbḥḍ | bn | ʾbḥḍ

1.[Yāsirum Yuhanʿim and his on Shammar Yuharʿish, the two kings of Sabaʾ and Dhū-Raydān … … and constructed and built ... ... the wall] and the glacis and the towers of their town 2.[of Hakirum, and they built it and constructed and completed the construction … … a construction in mud-brick and in stone ... .... And they increas]ed and built high its wall and its glacis 3.[and its towers with two roofs and with a roof in … ... its wall and its glacis and its towers from] its [upper part] to its foundation. And they constructed it and added 4.[a new wall, and they ??? and they equipped it ??? ... ... they repaired and reinforced for its gate door-leaves and a construction and] a completion with all accuracy, from the foundation to the 5.[the top—(this) in the space of ten days from the month of Dhū-Mubakkirān (i.e. May) ... ... by the power of their lord, ʿAthtar Shāriqān and their protective goddesses and] their (other) gods, and by the resources and the authority of the armies 6.[of Raydān. And they committed their town of Hakirum … … … in the month of Dhū-Qiyāẓān (i.e. June) of the year] 3[96] of the Era of Mabḥaḍ bin ʾAbḥuḍ.
